1534670.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands: The Weird West: Archetypes 02
1534670.description:
Deadlands: The Weird West: Archetypes 02

If you want to get your game started fast, this set of 12 archetype cards are for you! These cards contain a selection of iconic pre-made cowpokes to build a posse from or to use as handy NPCs in a pinch.
The following (seasoned) Archetypes are included in this set:
  • Bounty Hunter
  • Cowgirl
  • Metal Mage
  • Muckraker
  • Native Scout
  • Saloon Gal
  • Sawbones
  • Shaman
  • US Marshal
  • Vaquero
  • Voodooist
  • Witch
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Aki Heikkinen
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
